mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Tulsa Club was built through the joint effort of the Tulsa Chamber of Commerce and the Tulsa Club. [work]

The first five floors of the building were occupied by the Chamber and other business organizations while the top six floors and the roof garden were inhabited by the Tulsa Club. -- http://www.tulsapreservationcommission.org/artdeco/buildings/index.pl?id=69 [work]
